quote: for Jehovah had made all the women of the house of A·bimʹe·lech barren because of Sarah, Abraham’s wife.

They rose up and went up to Bethʹel to inquire of God. Then the people of Israel said: “Who of us should go up in the lead to the battle against the Benʹja·min·ites?” Jehovah replied: “Judah is to take the lead.”
At that he said: “If they have come out for peace, take them alive; or if they have come out for battle, you should still take them alive.”
